entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chipman
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
